subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: Ryan Whitney of the Ducks and Tim Gleason of the Hurricanes will replace the injured Paul Martin of the Devils and Mike Komisarek of the Maple Leafs.
snippet: Ryan Whitney of the Ducks and Tim Gleason of the Hurricanes will replace the injured Paul Martin of the Devils and Mike Komisarek of the Maple Leafs.
